subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] What do you think?

Shane,

I just started using esnips yesterday. The reason why your link isn=
't working is because you have to make the folder or item you upload public=
, or "Share With Anyone."

I had the same trouble with it as you until I fi=
gured this out. Go back and click "Edit" and you can change the settings.

=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Kristin Morris 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com 
  Sent: Friday, May 22, 2009 12:41 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] =
What do you think?






  Shane,

  The link didn't work.

  k




-------=
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

  =
From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of=
 Not given
  Sent: Friday, May 22, 2009 1:32 PM
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] What do you think?








  This is from the secon=
d time I used it(12-469). I haven't had much luck since, but I've changed r=
ooms (dunno if that makes much difference.)

  Anything to it or was I imag=
ining things up?

  http://www.esnips.com/doc/d5befe74-9592-4e31-87f1-b9d11=
6be95ec/12-469-decent-clip
